short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces Helvetica Neue font family from CSS font stack to use next fallback.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unlike other extensions, this one doesn't automatically provide Arial as fallback, to respect designer's second choise of font family.
